author: mwbrooks
msg: 18 - Bypass access feature defined by the config.xml

author: mwbrooks
msg: Update project script to close simulator before load-simulator.

author: mwbrooks
msg: Update project script to allow closing the simulator.
On x64 systems, a simulator invoked by 'load-simulator'
can only be closed by killing the process.
Thanks to some advice from Tim Neil at RIM, the simulator

author: jtyberg
msg: Make Geolocation object available through navigator.geolocation only
Keep navigator.geolocation from being defined more than once.
